prompts: How do you evaluate or launch LLM copilots?

messages.content: I'm Dupesh Nayak, a AI / ML Engineer focused on shipping AI that earns trust. I focus on designing retrieval-first AI systems with delightful UX. Over the past 3+ years I've led launches across Hyperloop AI. Recently I led Project Helix, Regulated-industry co-pilot with hybrid RAG + evals (Cut answer latency 42%).
I work daily with Retrieval, PyTorch, LangChain, and round things out with Rust, TensorRT, MLOps.
At Project Helix I owned the retrieval architecture, eval harness, and launch readiness. Regulated-industry co-pilot with hybrid RAG + evals. The punchline: Cut answer latency 42%.
How do you evaluate or launch LLM copilots?

For Project Helix I treated evaluation like code: curate gold questions, replay them through offline harnesses, and gate launches on precision + UX regressions. That rhythm keeps each copilot trustworthy.
